ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:55:02 [Issue ID 4000-42246] urn:comicvine:4000-42246 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-20 04:14:59. [Issue ID 42246]
ComicInfo.Summary: Tiffany lops off Spawn's head, only to see it turn into a mass of maggots in her hand -- she's been tricked! Spawn attacks, while the evil creatures in the woods gather to aid him. Together, they reduce the angel to bloody scraps. Spawn returns to New York and meets Cog, who warns Spawn that he must gain control of his costume. Meanwhile, Sam shares with Twitch his dream of opening his own detective agency.
ComicInfo.Title: Warriors
